book.synopsis: Craig Thompson was born in 1975 and grew up in a small farming community in Wisconsin. His debut graphic novel Good-Bye, Chunky Rice won the 1999 Harvey Award for
and his sophomore effort, the 500-page Blankets, will be released in summer 2003 by Top Shelf Productions.
